txt.en: 'There is dried kala, smoked kala, boiled kala, salted kala...'
'...kala chowder, kala stew, kala in a pelt, fried kala, kala pie....'
'You have got kala loaf, kala meal, kala and hirvi, kala broth, kala jerky...raw kala, I suppose, if you are starving.'
'There is really no end to what you can make with a little creativity and a lot of kala.'
